text: Does anyone know how to export a Gadfly plot to an `.eps` file? I'm aware of exporting to PDF, and that would work if need be, but I can't seem to find anywhere whether this is (or isn't) possible and I'd like to know.

elements.text: Does anyone know how to export a Gadfly plot to an
file? I'm aware of exporting to PDF, and that would work if need be, but I can't seem to find anywhere whether this is (or isn't) possible and I'd like to know.

text: Can we cross post this publicly to <https://discourse.julialang.org|Discourse> for further visibility? React with :bridge: on the message above to approve. <https://github.com/JuliaCommunity/SlackBridge/blob/main/README.md#faq|More info here>

Success, it has been cross posted <https://discourse.julialang.org/t/56370| to Discourse>. Keep and eye out on Discourse for responses and please add an answer there once you are satisfied with the solution so others can benefit as well. Happy debugging!
